section.title: CDK Plugins
section.para: Since October 2003 CDK features a plugin API. All programs implementing this API can make use of CDK plugins, one plugin that can run in all CDK based programs. At this moment there are two programs that implement the plugin API, and thus two programs in which the plugins can be run: Jmol and JChemPaint.
Below is a list of plugins that are currently available:
